name: Mango
desc: It is an edible stone fruit of the tropical tree Mangifera indica.

name: Apples
desc: Juicy apple fruit, which is eaten fresh and baked, serves as a raw material in cooking and for making drinks

name: Banana
desc: An elongated edible fruit, botanically a berry, produced by several species of large herbaceous flowering plants of the genus Musa

name: Blueberry
desc: Sweet wild berry, which has not only a pleasant taste, but also useful properties.

name: Raspberry
desc: A product capable of beneficially influencing the condition of the skin both from the inside and outside.

name: Cabbage
desc: An agricultural crop of the Cabbage family, it is widely used in the preparation of salads and as part of dishes.
